page.title: 02The Grange Farm.
page.content: The account starts with a description of a modern{farm}of today;'The Grange'. 'The Grange' is a dairy and beef farm with a mixed herd of 310 heifer_stock,150 milking cows and 50 one_year_old beef cattle.The bulls are sold when they are one_and_a_half years old and the heifers when they are two_and_a_half years old. The farm manager expects at least Â£12,000 for milk products and Â£2,000 for beef products. The{woods}around the farm contain mainly beech with some birch and oak.These all belong to the farm. The dairy products include pasteurized milk, homogenized milk, cream and ice cream. The farm is run by the manager who is hired by the owner_occupier.
